Articles.Content:
**STAR WARS MOTORIZED AT-ST**

**Update 1**

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/cnAkwFVOBms?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Originally created by Majorjim. I just added the IR parts and programmed them.**

**Mods**

- Infernal Robotics

- Infernal Robotics Rework

- IR Sequencer

- TweakScale

- KAS

**Next Update**

- Improved walking and running

- Controllable Head

I'll keep posting updates on this thread as I progress.

**I'm also thinking of doing an AT-AT (If I get enough request for it). So If you would like to see an AT-AT too please let me know down below!**
